article.Heading: Budget 2016: Fall in global equities could cause India to fall, says Roberts
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Latha Venkatesh and Sonia Shenoy, Chris Roberts shared his expectations from Arun Jaitely's Union Budget and his outlook on the road ahead.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Latha Venkatesh and Sonia Shenoy, Chris Roberts shared his expectations from Arun Jaitely's Union Budget and his outlook on the road ahead.

Watch the video for the full discussion...
